subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jon Niese allowed three earned runs or fewer for an 18th consecutive start, but a struggling Mets offense and two questionable plays in the field by Daniel Murphy muddied Niese’s night.
snippet: Jon Niese allowed three earned runs or fewer for an 18th consecutive start, but a struggling Mets offense and two questionable plays in the field by Daniel Murphy muddied Niese’s night.
